name: The Baronial Enchanted Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
At our 19th Century Enchanted Chateau located just thirty minutes outside Paris you will find a peaceful haven beautifully set in an estate covering five hectares of greenery. Following a full renovation in 2012 by the new proprietor, the Château is now reserved to rent for exclusive use, making it a perfect French Wedding Venue close to the heart of Paris.
Designed to ensure first-class comfort, personalised service and refined furnishings, every detail reflects the spirit of the setting.
With five grand reception halls, nine magnificent suites, sumptuous garden and grounds and the ultimate in refined furnishings, this chateau is the ideal setting to host your event or simply to enjoy a special moment with friends and family.
For the ultimate experience, our team along with coordinators, chef, butler, concierge and maid service ensures a truly Baronial experience and a taste of refined château life that will create long cherished memories.
Intimate or a larger wedding, hidden from sight, celebrate this milestone of your life in an enchanting setting with exclusive use of the Château.
Venue and Accommodation Capacity
This noble, stone-built residence spread over four floors offers over 2000 square meters of living space:
• The 5 salons: 300 m2
• The terrace: 170 m2
• 9 prestigious suites and rooms
• The gardens : 5 hectares
Capacity:
• Up to 150 guests for a seated dinner
• Up to 250 guests for a cocktail
• Accommodation up to 30 guests
The rates for the exclusive use of the Château vary according to different periods (High-Season and Winter Season) and to the number of guests invited to the reception.
(Nearest Airport: Charles de Gaulle International Airport 20 mins).
Full staff including chef, concierge & daily maid service.
Pricing:
Winter Season (October 1st - April 30th) Weekdays
Starting from 7.200€€
Winter Season (October 1st - April 30th) Weekends
Starting from 9.000 €
High Season (May 1st - September 30th Weekdays
Starting from 9.000 €
High Season (May 1st - September 30th Weekends
Starting from 11.700 €
For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
